name: Jessica Secret of the Caribbean
description:
Jessica Secret of the Caribbean is a classic hidden object game with a gripping storyline and a lot of mini-games.

Jessica and Tony fall in love, get married and go for a sweet honeymoon to the Caribbean. Things don't go according to plan when they get involved in a whole new hidden object adventure! Help Jessica rescue her kidnapped husband by finding the riches of Jessica's forefather, the famous pirate, Noel!

- Incredible atmosphere
- Fantastic gameplay
- Rescue Jessica's husband!
